official.headline: System Renewed
official.anchor_line: Previously removed residents return to full city access as oversight transitions continue.
official.contextual_reframing: Dynamic updates to the Behavioral Compliance Index guarantee a resilient, adaptive Stenograd. Residents benefit from seamlessly restored urban participation.

official.headline: Public Witness
official.anchor_line: Stenograd welcomes open dialogue as citizens share experiences of reintegration.
official.contextual_reframing: Order and clarity are ensured as the Council responds transparently to the transition, showcasing responsible governance.

official.headline: Trust in Clarity
official.anchor_line: Official channels address questions about system adjustments and resident restoration.
official.contextual_reframing: Continuous improvement of automated processes ensures reliable public services for all.

underground.headline: Ghosts Return
underground.anchor_line: People once erased by the system are back, untracked and unseen by the city’s all-seeing eye.
underground.contextual_reframing: For years, BCI meant compliance or vanishing. Now the cracks show. Ghosts walk the streets with no score to follow.

underground.headline: Silence Breaks
underground.anchor_line: Crowds gather as the stories of the disappeared finally reach daylight.
underground.contextual_reframing: No more invisible losses. The so-called Behavioral Compliance Index missed more than glitches: it hid lives.

underground.headline: Truth Unsealed
underground.anchor_line: Rumors fly of leaks inside the Council after Halden’s death. Something big went wrong.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Directorate fights to bury what’s broken. But leaked protocols brought the erased back—not some planned ‘renewal.’
